subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Colt Knost shot a six-under 66 to take a two-stroke lead over Carl Pettersson after the second round of the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
snippet: Colt Knost shot a six-under 66 to take a two-stroke lead over Carl Pettersson after the second round of the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
